comment: Austria - An advertisement of the Austrian Federal Railways and its customer railway card. It reads: For mother,father, partners or friends who are traveling with children. Is that what Austria looks like now? Sickening propaganda trying to normalize sexual deviant behavior.

                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Austria"
                              :op2 "Federal"
                              :op3 "Railways"))
                  :op2 (c2 / card

      :snt2 (r2 / read-01

                  :ARG1 (l / look-02

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Austria"))

                        :time (n3 / now))
                  :ARG2 (o / or
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91

                                    :ARG2 (m2 / mother)))

                                    :ARG1 c4
                                    :ARG2 (f / father)))
                        :op3 (p3 / person

                              :ARG1-of p4)
                        :op4 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 c4
                                    :ARG2 (f2 / friend)))
                        :ARG0-of (t2 / travel-01
                              :accompanier (c5 / child)))))
      :snt3 (p6 / propaganda
            :ARG0-of (s2 / sicken-01)
            :ARG0-of (t3 / try-01
                  :ARG1 (n4 / normalize-01
                        :ARG0 p6
                        :ARG1 (b / behave-01
                              :ARG1 (d / deviant
                                    :mod (s3 / sex)))))))
